exceptions.exn: In environment a, x : R Unable to unify "Derive ?M2363 ?M2364 = ?M2365" with "Lim (fun h : R => (a - a) / h) 0 = 0".
In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), is_derive f x l -> Derive f x = l a, x : R Unable to unify "Prop" with "Lim (fun h : R => (a - a) / h) 0 = 0".
The LHS of Rabs_Rabsolu (Rabs (Rabs _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), is_derive f x l -> Derive f x = l a, x : R X : (?K -> ?V) -> ?K -> ?V -> Prop X0 : (?K0 -> ?V0) -> ?K0 -> ?V0 -> Prop H0 : forall x : R, Rabs (Rabs x) = Rabs x Unable to unify "?M3467 = ?M3468 -> False" with "Lim (fun h : R => (a - a) * / h) 0 = 0".

In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), is_derive f x l -> Derive f x = l a, x : R X : (?K -> ?V) -> ?K -> ?V -> Prop X0 : (?K0 -> ?V0) -> ?K0 -> ?V0 -> Prop H0 : forall x : R, Rabs (Rabs x) = Rabs x X1 : (?K1 -> ?V1) -> ?K1 -> ?V1 -> Prop H3 : forall x y : Z, Zeq_bool x y = false -> x = y -> False Unable to unify "0" with "(Lim (fun h : R => (a - a) * / h) 0)²".

original: intros a x. unfold Derive. simpl. apply is_derive_unique. apply is_derive. unfold filterdiff. unfold scal. unfold mult. unfold Rdiv. rewrite Rabs_Rabsolu. apply Zeq_bool_neq. apply Rsqr_0_uniq. reflexivity.
